channel.title: BrowserSync on Mikhail Shilkov
channel.description: Recent content in BrowserSync on Mikhail Shilkov

item.title: Mocking API calls in Aurelia
item.description: Aurelia is a modern and slick single-page application framework. “Single-page application” aspect means that it’s loaded into the browser once, and then the navigation happens on the client side and all the data are loaded from a REST API endpoint.
